sentences.sentence: In a televised address, he also said that he would be held accountable for the October 7 Hamas assault on his country that left 1,405 dead, but that it will have to wait for Israel's campaign on the Gaza Strip to be over.

sentences.sentence: For some people, it might just be a message on the wall. But for others, it means fear.

sentences.sentence: This graffiti in front of a Jewish building in Brussels was done after a big pro-Palestinian demonstration at the European Quarter in the Belgian capital.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: And the message is not so innocent, as one rabbi tells Euronews.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Since the Israeli-Hamas conflict started, there's been a huge increase in anti-Semitism.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Attacks against Jews include physical incidents and verbal aggression, but also hate graffiti and online threats.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: And even though the authorities are increasing protection levels, European Jews are afraid.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10

sentences.sentence: We do get a lot of information, a lot of calls, a lot of e-mails from Jewish people from Europe, both individuals and institutions, synagogues, schools. People see in the street, they get much more remarks, many more bad looks, hatred looks, and call for death and physical incitements.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Euronews visited this synagogue in the heart of Brussels, but for security reasons did not film outside the building.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The safety measures are draconian. Rabbi Margolin showed us images of hate incidents from all over Europe. This is a school in Germany that you could see a mark of graffiti. This is a demonstration against Jews that took place in Spain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: This is another graffiti on a Jewish house, which reminds us of the Kristallnacht, where unfortunately people broke windows of synagogues.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Magyar Attila, Euronews, Pozsony. Developing countries need billions of euros in infrastructure investment

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: if they're to improve basic living conditions, and the EU says it's putting the money on the table.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: At the first summit of its kind, the Global Gateway Forum in Brussels on Wednesday saw around 20 heads of state and government demonstrate their interest in the bloc's investment programme, launched two years ago now. Ursula von der Leyen says that many can offer money, but Europe is doing it on a values-based approach.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Global gateway is about giving choices to countries, better choices, because for many countries around the world, investment options are not only limited, but they all come with a lot of small print and sometimes with a very high price.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Sometimes it is the environment that pays the price. Sometimes it is workers who are stripped of their rights.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Sometimes foreign workers are brought in.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And sometimes national sovereignty is compromised.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The EU is throwing 300 billion euros into the ring for the next three years, as it plays catch-up with China's own Belt and Road Initiative, which has already invested $1 trillion over the last decade.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Several investment agreements were signed with countries from Africa and Asia, though, including one with Bangladesh.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Green energy projects in the country will receive 45 million euros in E.U. grants and a 350 million euros loan from the European Investment Bank.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Aware of the global competition for greater geopolitical influence, Bangladesh will maintain its involvement in the Chinese initiative and will assess each case individually.

sentences.sentence: For our development, anybody come forward.
